GAMEPLAY_SkiGogglesDescription.English: Finally something to protect the eyes from bright light and the cold.
GAMEPLAY_SkiGogglesDescription.German: Endlich etwas, um die Augen vor grellem Licht und Kälte zu schützen.
GAMEPLAY_SkiGogglesDescription.Russian: Защищает глаза от яркого света и холода.
GAMEPLAY_SkiGogglesDescription.Turkish: Sonunda gözleri parlak ışıktan ve soğuktan korumak için bir şey.
GAMEPLAY_SkiGogglesDescription.Italian: Finalmente qualcosa per proteggere gli occhi dalla luce e dal freddo.
GAMEPLAY_SkiGogglesDescription.Polish: Wreszcie coś do ochrony oczu przed słońcem i chłodem
GAMEPLAY_SkiGogglesDescription.French (France): Enfin quelque chose pour protéger les yeux de la lumière vive et du froid.

GAMEPLAY_SkiMaskDescription.English: Very warm ski mask, covering most of the face.
GAMEPLAY_SkiMaskDescription.German: Sehr warme Skimaske, die den Großteil des Gesichts bedeckt.
GAMEPLAY_SkiMaskDescription.Russian: Очень тёплая лыжная маска, покрывающая большую часть лица.
GAMEPLAY_SkiMaskDescription.Turkish: Yüzün çoğunu kaplayan çok sıcak kayak maskesi.
GAMEPLAY_SkiMaskDescription.Italian: Una maschera da sci che tiene caldo, coprendo la maggior parte della faccia.
GAMEPLAY_SkiMaskDescription.Polish: Bardzo ciepła maska narciarska zakrywająca większość twarzy
GAMEPLAY_SkiMaskDescription.French (France): Masque de ski très chaud, couvrant la majeure partie du visage.

GAMEPLAY_BeanieCapDescription.English: A warm hat for being out in the cold.
GAMEPLAY_BeanieCapDescription.Russian: Тёплая шапка для прогулок на холоде.
GAMEPLAY_BeanieCapDescription.Italian: Un cappello che ti terrà al caldo.
GAMEPLAY_BeanieCapDescription.Polish: Ciepła wełniana czapka na mroźne dni
GAMEPLAY_BeanieCapDescription.French (France): Un couvre-chef chaud pour sortir dans le froid.

GAMEPLAY_FaceMaskDescription.English: Sometime before the apocalypse, people used to wear these everywhere.
GAMEPLAY_FaceMaskDescription.Russian: Когда-то до апокалипсиса люди носили их везде.
GAMEPLAY_FaceMaskDescription.Italian: Prima dell'apocalisse le persone le indossavano dappertutto.
GAMEPLAY_FaceMaskDescription.Polish: Kiedyś, przed apokalipsą, ludzie nosili je wszędzie
GAMEPLAY_FaceMaskDescription.French (France): Quelque temps avant l'apocalypse, les gens portaient ça partout.

GAMEPLAY_FarmBootsDescription.English: Not very warm, but tough and made for working.
GAMEPLAY_FarmBootsDescription.Russian: Не очень тёплые, но прочные и созданы для работы.
GAMEPLAY_FarmBootsDescription.Italian: Non tengono molto caldo, ma sono robusti e fatti per lavorare.
GAMEPLAY_FarmBootsDescription.Polish: Niezbyt ciepłe, ale wytrzymałe i przeznaczone do pracy
GAMEPLAY_FarmBootsDescription.French (France): Pas très chaudes, mais résistantes et faites pour travailler.
